Welcome to the official Dev0 Discord server! This is your go-to hub for all things Dev0—whether you’re seeking support, sharing feedback, or connecting with the community.
By joining our Discord server, you can:
Get Support: Reach out to our team and community members for help with Dev0. Whether it’s troubleshooting, setup questions, or technical issues, we’re here to assist you.
Stay Updated: Be the first to know about updates, new features, and announcements.
Engage with the Community: Share your experiences, tips, and feedback with fellow Dev0 users.
Suggest Features: Have ideas to improve Dev0? Post them in the suggestions channel, and we’ll consider them for future updates.
Support Channels: Dedicated spaces to ask questions and report bugs.
Announcements: Stay informed with the latest news and patch notes.
Community Chat: A general discussion area to connect with other users.
Suggestion Box: Submit your feature requests or vote on others’ suggestions.
Beta Testing Access: Get early access to new features and provide valuable feedback.
Joining our Discord server is easy! Click the link below to get started:
Join the Discord Server
To ensure a welcoming and productive environment for everyone, please follow these guidelines:
Be Respectful: Treat everyone with kindness and respect.
Stay On-Topic: Use the appropriate channels for specific topics.
No Spamming: Avoid posting irrelevant or repetitive content.
Follow Discord’s Terms of Service: Ensure compliance with Discord’s community standards.
Violations of these rules may result in warnings or removal from the server.
FAQ Welcome to the Dev0 FAQ! Below you'll find answers to common questions about the platform. If your question isn’t listed, feel free to reach out via our GitHub Discussions or Discord community.
Dev0 is an open-source bot designed to help Discord server admins manage their communities with features like moderation, roles, custom messages, economy systems, and more.
Yes! Dev0 is completely free and open source. You can also contribute to its development or modify it to suit your needs. Dev0 also offers a premium service with some extra benefits!

l: How do I add Dev0 to my Discord server?
p: Click the button below to invite Dev0 to your server.
Invite Dev0
Follow the instructions to authorize the bot.
Use the /setup command to begin configuring your server.

l: Where can I find the documentation?
p: You can access our full documentation here.

l: Can I customize Dev0 for my server?
p: Absolutely! Dev0 is highly customizable, allowing you to configure moderation rules, role assignments, and even your server’s economy system. Check out the documentation for detailed guides.

l: Where is the source code hosted?
p: The source code is available on our GitHub repository. Feel free to fork it or submit pull requests to contribute.

l: What programming language is Dev0 written in?
p: Dev0 is built using JavaScript and Node.js for the bot, and its supporting site is powered by Retype static site generator.

l: How do I report a bug or suggest a feature?
p: You can report bugs or suggest features via our GitHub Issues page.
Join our Discord Community to connect with other users and the development team.
Check the documentation for troubleshooting guides.
Definitely! Dev0 welcomes community contributions. Whether it’s code, documentation, or feedback, your input helps make the platform better. Visit our Contributing Guide to get started.
Still have questions? Let us know:
Contact Us
